author: orlikowski
msg: The diagnosis of the location of ndbm.h was broken for mod_rewrite and
mod_auth_dbm on some systems using glibc 2.2 (i.e. SuSE 7.1).

author: gregames
msg: back out the logging of read errors in getline.  daedalus was logging
boatloads of "(54)Connection reset by peer: ap_get_brigade() failed" errors.

author: trawick
msg: Empty out the brigade shared by ap_getline()/ap_get_client_block()
on error exit from ap_getline().  Some other code got upset because
the wrong data was in the brigade.

author: rederpj
msg: Added my info (Reder) to the contributors list.

author: rederpj
msg: Added my public key to the list.
